candidates.additionalServicesDesc: Higherd is your one-stop shop for international recruitment of STEM candidates. Our local recruiters thoroughly check candidates‚Äô backgrounds. In addition, our value-based AI technology ensures cultural fit with your company and local team. At Higherd, you get a genuine candidate background, higher employee retention rates, and dedicated support to optimize all international procedures.
candidates.preparationDescription: Our dedicated recruiters are here to match your clients with the perfect candidates, ensuring cultural and professional fit. By accessing a vast pool of exceptional STEM talent, we help you fill positions faster, enabling you to meet your clients‚Äô needs with confidence.
candidates.visaSupportDescription: Bureaucratic hurdles are major challenges in cross-border hiring. We ensure a stress-free relocation experience for you and your employees. We take care of everything!
candidates.languageCoursesDescription: How can we ensure higher employee retention rates? Our comprehensive learning and development program focuses on organizing certified courses, on-the-job training, and access to government funding programs to ensure stronger ties to your company and mission.
candidates.continuousSupportDescription: A wide range of candidates from various industries to help you build strong and diverse teams.

items.q: Can I change the plan at any time?
items.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime to match your career needs.
No, there is no setup fee.

items.q: Do you offer support during the free trial?
items.a: Yes, our support is available during the trial as well.

items.q: How does ad revenue sharing work in the base plan?
items.a: You pay a percentage of revenue on successful hires.
We accept credit card, SEPA direct debit and PayPal.

faqs.q: How do I apply for a student job?
faqs.a: Simply create a profile and apply directly to listings that interest you.
